description: A young boy from the Stars of Sagacity, an organization related to Kazuma`s past and Tsui-Ling`s death. He uses Misao`s anger at Kazuma and promised to grant her wishes. In truth, he only uses her as a medium, in order to obtain enough yoki, or life energy, to kill Kazuma. He is killed by Ayano`s Shinen-empowered Enraiha.
name: Michael Harley
